data.title: Giving to Grinnell
data.text:
It's your gift, your choice, your opportunity.

By giving to Grinnell, you sustain our commitment to fully preparing today’s Grinnellians-in-the-making — regardless of their ability to afford a college education. With your gift today, you honor students, as they overturn assumptions and subvert the obvious. And you make it possible for Grinnellians of today and tomorrow to keep inventing the world — as only Grinnellians can.

Learn more about giving to Grinnell below and through the links on the left.

What to support

Support Grinnell by giving to your passions. Gifts can be made to the Pioneer Fund (unrestricted use) or to our campus priority, Scholarships and Financial Aid. You can also give to any organization, program, department, or project on campus. Through our online giving form you can designate your gift to one or multiple areas of support in a single gift.

Learn more about how you can support Grinnell on our What to Support landing page.

Ways to Give
